results.title: Placebo-controlled study of lisinopril in congestive heart failure: a multicentre study.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ improved significantly more than placebo-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (p less than 0.05) for all clinical parameters except @DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hemoglobinuria_Paroxysmal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006457 @@@paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnoea@@@.

citations.NLM: Chalmers JP, West MJ, Cyran J, De La Torre D, Englert M, Kramar M, Lewis GR, Maranhao MF, Myburgh DP, Schuster P. Placebo-controlled study of lisinopril in congestive heart failure: a multicentre study. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1987;9 Suppl 3():S89-97. PMID: 2442560
